Properties.Value: Specifies a description of the number series.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the date from which you want this number series to apply. You use this field if you want to start a new series at the beginning of a new period. You set up a number series line for each period. The program will automatically switch to the new series on the starting date.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the first number in the series.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the last number in the series.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the date when a number was most recently assigned from the number series.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the last number that was used from the number series.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies when you want to receive a warning that the number series is running out. You enter a number from the series. The program will provide a warning when this number is reached. You can enter a maximum of 20 characters, both numbers and letters.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the value for incrementing the numeric part of the series.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies whether this number series will be used to assign numbers automatically.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies that you can enter numbers manually instead of using this number series.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies to check that numbers are assigned chronologically.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies that a number assigned from the number series can later be deleted. This is practical for records, such as item cards and warehouse documents that, unlike financial transactions, can be deleted and cause gaps in the number sequence. This setting also means that new numbers will be generated and assigned in a faster, non-blocking way. NOTE: If an error occurs on a new record that will be assigned a number from such a number series when it is completed, the number in question will be lost, causing a gap in the sequence.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the implementation to use for getting numbers.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: View or edit additional information about the number series lines.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: View or edit relationships between number series.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Test whether the number series can generate new numbers.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Show number series that require your attention, such as, number series that have no lines or an have open lines which have reached the warning threshold.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: This promoted group is no longer used, please create a group manually.
